title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
**Product Title:** [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets

**Product Description:**

Are you preparing for an international trip to Italy, Chile, or other countries with Type L power outlets? Look no further than our VINTAR 3-Prong Grounded Plug Travel Power Adapter. This ultra-light and compact adapter is designed to provide a convenient and safe way to charge your devices on the go.

**Key Features:**

- 3-Pack adapter set for multiple device charging
- Compatible with standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs
- 4-in-1 outlet adapter with dual USB ports (up to 2.4A) and 2 American outlets
- Safe grounded 3 prong plug for secure charging
- Suitable for devices such as cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electric products
- Compatible with countries including Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, and Vatican City
- Ultra-light and compact design (2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 inches)
- CE and FCC certified for quality assurance
- 12-month warranty with friendly customer service

**Important Notes:**

- This adapter is NOT a converter. Devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage for proper function.
- Maximum capacity: 2500 Watt (max 250 Volt, 10 A)

**What's Included:**

- 3 x VINTAR 3-Prong Grounded Plug Travel Power Adapters
- Friendly customer service and 12-month warranty

**Order now and stay connected on your international travels!**
